Frameless Shower Doors
Giant Glass & Mirror specializes in custom designed frameless shower doors at discounted prices. Whether new construction, a bathroom remodeling project, or a replacement installation, we have the knowledge, skills, and experience for the job.
Frameless Tub Enclosures
Giant Glass & Mirror offers many styles of tub enclosures. Glass tub enclosures are a wonderful alternative to shower curtains. With recent advances in glass tempering, it has become easier to install glass tub doors than ever before.
Frameless Shower Shields
Giant Glass & Mirror specializes in custom designed frameless shower doors at discounted prices. Whether new construction, a bathroom remodeling project, or a replacement installation, we have the knowledge, skills, and experience for the job.
Glass Partitions
Define open space without sacrificing openness by having Giant Glass & Mirror design a custom frameless glass partition for your office or home. Frameless glass partitions have long been a popular design element for commercial spaces, such as offices, restaurants, hotels, spas and even homes.
Glass Shelves
Giant Glass & Mirror designs custom floating glass shelves at discounted prices for many uses. Add a touch of elegance to your home with Giant Glass & Mirror's floating glass shelves. Our custom glass shelves are available in various sizes, making it easy to customize the look you want. You can choose from 3/8`` glass up to 3/4`` glass for your personal preference.
Glass Table Tops
Giant Glass & Mirror can cut a glass table top to meet your specific wants, needs, and likes for a stand alone piece of furniture or to beautify and help protect the finest of wood surfaces from scratches and wear. Glass table tops are available in a variety of thicknesses, ranging from 1/8`` thick inlays to 3/4`` free-standing tops that can be cut into any shape.
Glass Wine Cellars
Fully-enclosed glass wine cellars are the best solution for storing your wine without being intrusive to the design of your home. With a frameless construction and stunning glass, your unique wine cellar will compliment your space and blend right inside your home – like a fine piece of art.
Hydro Slider Doors
Giant Glass & Mirror specializes in Hydro Slider Doors at discounted prices. Whether new construction, a bathroom remodeling project, or a replacement installation, we have the knowledge, skills, and experience for the job.
Mirrors
Mirrors can make almost any space appear brighter and more spacious. Our beautiful mirrors are customized to meet your specific needs with a full range of sizes and styles to suit your taste. Whether you need to mirror an entire wall, small area, or simply want to replace the vanity mirror in your bathroom, Giant Glass & Mirror is the ``Right Choice.``
Beveled Glass & Mirrors
We provide in-house beveled glass & mirror service, ensuring unparalleled quality, affordability, and customization. By managing the intricate beveling process in-house, we can create unique glass & mirrors that cater to individual tastes and needs, all while maintaining swift installation and a strong commitment to customer satisfaction and environmentally responsible practices.
Switchable Smart Glass
Transform the look and feel of your home, office, or business with modern Switchable Smart Glass - a type of intelligent glass that can change its state from crystal clear transparency to completely opaque with the flick of a switch.
Yachts
Giant Glass & Mirror specializes in custom designed frameless shower doors, custom glass and mirrors for Yachts and Luxury boats. Whether new, a bathroom remodeling project, or a replacement installation, we have the knowledge, skills, and experience for the job.

Industry Fabrication

At Giant Glass & Mirror, our expertise extends beyond residential and commercial clients to encompass Industry Fabrication, a vital service catering to installers who may not possess their own fabrication equipment or capacity. Recognizing the unique needs of our industry partners, we have developed specialized fabrication processes that enable us to offer custom-made glass and mirrors to fit any specifications. Leveraging our 30 years of experience and state-of-the-art technology, we ensure precision, quality, and timely delivery, bridging the gap for installers and facilitating their projects.

Our Industry Fabrication services symbolize our commitment to fostering relationships within the industry and supporting fellow businesses in their quest for excellence. We understand the importance of precision and quality in every piece we create, and our in-house fabrication capabilities enable us to provide tailored solutions that align with the specific needs and goals of our industry partners. By entrusting Giant Glass & Mirror with their fabrication needs, installers can focus on what they do best, confident in the knowledge that they are backed by a leader in glass and mirror craftsmanship. Contact us today to inquire about Industry Fabrication or learn more here.

BKR REUSABLE GLASS WATER BOTTLES: ENDLESSLY REFILLABLE, BEAUTIFULLY SUSTAINABLE

Oh hey, you’ve arrived! Welcome to bkr. If you’re wondering what the big deal is, why that one friend of yours is so obsessed with a glass water bottle, and how life could possibly be better on the other side of this velvet rope, you’re in the right place. This is where we’ll tell you a little bit more about why we’re not just a glass water bottle and why you just found your hydration soulmate and the thing that’s about to become the best thing you’ve ever owned. First, definition and pronunciation:  bkr /beak·er/ˈbēkər/ noun 1) the endlessly refillable, beautifully sustainable, original cult favorite glass water bottle (named after the glass container from chemistry class); 2) the very first ever lip balm water bottle (the “kiss kit”), and; 3) dishwasher safe, holds no scent, clean, clear, loved. But WHY SO LOVED? You kind of have to own one to understand. bkr is a magical accumulation of little details that together feel like luxury. It’s like the perfect t-shirt of water bottles. It’s soft and pretty, it feels right and fits right, you want it in every color, it’s effortless, you can’t help but love it, and it becomes an extension of you. Wait so, why did we make a vegan lip balm in Paris, and why did we engineer a special cap to snap it to the top of your bkr? Because our lips were dry despite owning every lip product known to man, we knew we’d kill it, and we knew it would become our next most treasured invention. We don’t release anything that isn’t perfection. Btw, we’re also a community of good people who care about others. We hope you’re here for it. Life gets better on this side of the velvet rope.

See All Industries offers a wide selection of mirror styles and finishes for your every safety, security, industrial, cosmetic and decorator need. All of our mirrors are available in a full range of sizes and styles to meet every requirement.

                                                                



   SAFETY MIRRORS  
Whether accidents are major or minor, they increase your costs significantly. Accidents result in damaged equipment and merchandise, injured employees, lost time and lower morale. See All convex mirrors and dome mirrors provide a wide angle allowing a view around obstructions.
 
		   SECURITY MIRRORS  
See All convex mirrors and dome mirrors inhibit would-be shoplifters. In addition, they give employees a sharp-image view of an entire store area. Valued as the greatest deterrent to theft, See All is used and acclaimed by leading retailers.
 



   INDUSTRIAL MIRRORS  
See All convex mirrors, dome mirrors and inspection mirrors assist in monitoring conveyor lines, automatic packaging and quality control. For true views, See All's line of flat and framed mirrors are perfect for any commercial or industrial application.
 
		
   VANITY MIRRORS  
See All's collection of distinctive, solid brass mirrors vanity mirrors for both the bedroom and bathroom will enhance any decor. Lighted mirrors feature a non-fogging distortion free glass with magnification for makeup, hair styling, contact lenses or shaving.
 



   WARMRAILS HEATED TOWEL WARMERS AND DRYING RACKS  

Warmrails towel warmers and drying racks are an energy-efficient addition to your home, helping both the environment and your budget. Warmrails heated towel warmers and drying racks use less energy than most standard light bulbs and can be run 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. It is far easier and much more cost-effective to run a heated towel warmer and drying rack than a full sized dryer. Each Warmrails towel rack comes with ample room & power to warm a full set of bath, hand & face towels. Their finishes & modern design go perfectly with any bathroom style.

Our in-house team of artisans will craft to your specifications.

Why choose us?

Carbon Footprint – Reducing our carbon footprint has gained significant importance in recent years as we strive for a more sustainable future. One area where we can make a positive impact is in the use of low VOC ingredients in our sub-irrigation planters. By incorporating these environmentally-friendly materials with our sub-irrigation technologies, we can not only minimize the release of harmful chemicals into the air but also ensure the health and well-being of our plants, ourselves and the planet striving for the goal of a carbon-neutral footprint in the future. We proudly comply with U.S regulations which are the most stringent guidelines in the world.

Manufactured – In Orange, California and Phoenix, Arizona. We proudly support and stimulate the US economy.

Warranty – We back our product like no body else! Since we make our product in the USA, you can be confident  we will be there for you and your customers.

Tailor-Made – We welcome custom designs and colors, turning your vision into a reality.

Responsive – If you need quick service and delivery of fiberglass planters, we can help.

LiSEC glass processing machines are manufactured in Austria with the utmost care and precision. Customers around the world benefit from the outstanding quality and reliability offered by LiSEC. LiSEC's export quota is over 95%. The hallmarks of LiSEC glass processing machine technology are robustness and durability. LiSEC underpins its position as a technology leader with over 330 patents and 7% of turnover going into research and development. The company's customers benefit from innovative strength and the aim of continuously improving the quality and efficiency of flat glass processing.

Timeless Artistry: The Unmatched Stained Glass Designs of Soos Stained Glass

Welcome to Soos Stained Glass, the premier stained glass company based out of Little Rock, Arkansas. With over 40 years of experience, we have been committed to delivering unparalleled stained glass designs and exceptional craftsmanship to our clients. Our work is a testament to the rich history and traditions of the 1000-year-old art form of stained glass. Our guiding principle is to create works of art that will stand the test of time and bring joy for generations to come.

﻿

We pride ourselves on collaborating with our clients, committees, architects, designers, and general contractors to create unified artwork without sacrificing the aesthetics of the finished product. At Soos Stained Glass, we understand that each project is unique, and we tailor our approach to meet the needs and ideas of our clients.

﻿

Experience the beauty and elegance of stained glass art like never before with Soos Stained Glass. Let us bring your vision to life with our expertise and artistry.

LEADERS IN DESIGN

Founded in 1938 SADEV has been manufacturing stainless steel precision components to various industries worldwide. The division Architectural Glass Systems was established in 1993 and now includes locations and subsidiaries around the world.

VIEW PROJECTS
Architectural Glass Systems

Our Architectural Glass Systems have a standard range of products which includes fittings for external and internal applications – SADEV Classic for the exterior building envelope, SADEV Decor for interior build outs, and SADEV SABCO for handrail and balustrade components.

In addition to our standard line of products we offer engineering/design services, custom fabrication/finishing, and single source responsibility. These include guardrails, windscreens, canopy frames, point supported facades & other support structures which can be designed and fabricated per project specifications.

FACADES & CANOPIES (CLASSIC)
INTERIOR SYSTEMS (DÉCOR)
BALUSTRADES & RAILINGS
CUSTOM FABRICATION
FACADES & CANOPIES (CLASSIC)
Our original line of products for point supported glazing structures.  SADEV was involved in the manufacturing some of the first projects using articulated glass bolts (Rotules). As a result we were the first company to offer a standard catalog range of spiders and rotules for structural glazing. Our classic line has evolved to include glass wall claddings, clamp fittings, tensions rods, and more.
LEARN MORE
INTERIOR SYSTEMS (DÉCOR)
The Décor product line has evolved from simple point fixed glass connections to many types of all glass sliding and swing doors.  The components compliment modern interiors but can also be just as at home in classical architectural renovations. The connections are very modular which allows for almost infinite possibilities.
LEARN MORE
BALUSTRADES & RAILINGS

Originally considered a part of our Decor line of products the SABCo (SADEV Balustrade Concepts) has evolved into a line of it’s own.  We offer a range of point fix guardrails and railing components as well as our new SABCo aluminum base shoe system.
LEARN MORE

CUSTOM FABRICATION
At SADEV USA we have our own fabrication, machining, and finishing facility to produce anything ranging from small precision machined parts to large structures that can be delivered to job sites. A pre-fabricated structure ensures that tolerances can be controlled for a precision installation.
LEARN MORE

We are Schodorf Truck Body & Equipment Company, a leading manufacturer and distributor of truck bodies and truck equipment.


Known nationally as a major manufacturer of Glass carriers and Chipper bodies, we also take great pride in the fact that we are Ohio's oldest re-seller of truck bodies,  equipment, and accessories.

With the addition of the best quality Hiniker Snow plows and Snow Ex spreaders, we have become Central Ohio's snow and ice control headquarters, equipment, and service providers.


At our Columbus, Ohio facility, we service and repair all types of truck bodies and related equipment. Our parts department is stocked with a large variety of truck accessories and replacement parts.

Every Moment is a Memory

We are designers, fabricators and installers of stainless steel railing systems for both commercial and residential applications. We have served architects, designers, developers and general contractors since 1982. We hold a glazing contractor’s C-17, D12 and D-24
our License number is 571796 and also an architect metal contractor 571796 license. We also hold Los Angeles research report number on our Circa system LARR 26084 and aluminum base shoes channel system is engineer for the safety factor of four.

Welcome to Three Rivers Optical

Three Rivers Optical has been in business since 1969, and in that time, we have developed a deep understanding of the unique needs and challenges of independent practitioners. We are committed to providing our customers with not only the best products but also personalized service and support.

What We Offer

High Quality Products

Industry Leading Turnaround Times

Outstanding Customer Service

Our Products
Lenses

We provide a diverse selection of lenses for our eye care professionals.

Coatings

We offer many cutting-edge coating solutions for our customers.

Frames

Learn about the different styles of frames that we offer.

Private Brand

Three Rivers Optical offers our in-house private label SEEMORE Brand.

Our Commitment to Eye-Care Professionals
We operate with a combination of quality, commitment, and impeccable customer service.

IDOC and Three Rivers Optical stand firmly behind the independent optometric community. Our commitment is to provide you with exceptional products, education, and support. As the largest independent alliance in optometry and a leading national independent optical lab with a combined 75+ years of experience, we understand the challenges of running your private practice. Let our combined expertise help you overcome challenges and obstacles and move your business forward.

Our goal is to understand your values and focus on your philosophy to help you grow your business. Maintaining our commitment to quality and fast turn time is a critical piece of our business model while keeping our prices competitive. Striving to be your best laboratory business partner, we understand the importance of building relationships and providing personalized support. We are here as an independent resource for your independent practice and will work tirelessly towards exceeding your expectations. Hopefully by working together we can help you succeed and achieve your business goals in our highly competitive industry.

This is
Who We Are

We specialize in the creative and highly customized concept design, bringing your wildest ideas to life. From fabrication derived from our 3D modeling and engineering capabilities to working off your blueprints, we have the expertise to turn any vision into reality.

At our shop, we take pride in our ability to create awe-inspiring environments, moments and signs whether they are commercial, residential, retro, or modern. Our team is skilled in sculptural fabrication, ensuring that every piece we create is a work of art. From one-of-a-kind pieces to large production runs, we have the capacity to handle projects of any scale.

Excelling in special event fabrication, making your events truly unforgettable. With our fast project quoting, you can expect a prompt and efficient experience from start to finish. Our dedication to quality and craftsmanship has earned us high-end professional acclaim, including being featured in various news networks and being listed as one of the top interior designers in Dallas on Dallas Best website.

From POS and entrance desks to art and unique functional lighting, we can create unique and eye-catching elements for any creative space. Our expertise extends to business signage of all kinds, ensuring that your brand/vision stands out.

READ MORE

What sets Decotron apart?  We are adept at working with all materials, combining nostalgic and modern technology to bring your ideas to life. Whether it’s engineering large, heavy public art pieces or fulfilling larger fabrication runs, we have the skills and experience to bring any project into fruition.

Decotron is here to make you become the trendsetter.  So, do you want to join the club?  Be one of our satisfied clients and let us turn your imagination into tangible creations. Contact us today to discuss your project and let’s embark on an exciting journey of creativity and innovation together.

DELIVERY & INSTALLS THROUGHOUT THE USA
Decotron Services


At our custom fabrication shop, we prioritize quality, attention to detail, and customer satisfaction. We work closely with our clients throughout the design and fabrication process to ensure that their vision is fully realized. With our team’s extensive experience and commitment to excellence, we are confident in our ability to exceed your expectations.

CUSTOM FABRICATION

We have the expertise and resources to bring your unique design ideas to life. From intricate metalwork and woodworking to large sculptures, our team excels in creating custom pieces that meet your specific requirements.

HIGH-END DESIGN

We are committed to delivering exceptional design solutions that elevate the aesthetic appeal of any space. Our team of designers possesses a deep understanding of contemporary, modern and timeless design trends and can create visually stunning and functional designs.

COMMERCIAL PROJECTS

Whether it’s an architectural feature, retail development, office space or any other commercial establishment, we have the skills and knowledge to execute large-scale projects with precision. Our focus on innovative troubleshooting and quality craftsmanship ensures that your project stands out from the regardless if it’s value or luxury engineered.

PUBLIC SPACES

We have extensive experience in designing and fabricating custom elements for all public spaces such as parks, museums, innovation centers, urban developments and cultural centers. Our team can create eye-catching installations and structures that enhance the overall ambiance and functionality of these spaces.

UNIQUE ENVIRONMENTS

If you have a specific vision for a one-of-a-kind environment, we are here to turn it into reality. Our team thrives on challenging and unconventional projects, and we have the expertise to bring your wildest ideas to life.

RESIDENTIAL PROJECTS

We specialize in creating bespoke designs for residential spaces, catering to the unique preferences and requirements of homeowners. From custom doors and furniture to architectural features,we an transform your home into a personalized sanctuary.

ELECTRICAL CONTRACTOR

Our fabrication shop offers comprehensive electrical contractor services, including expert wiring, lighting installation, power solutions for custom signs, architectural elements and commercial environments with precision-driven skilled team.

INTERIOR DESIGN

Decotron ARTISTs custom shop provides full scale interior design services from concept development to custom installations that enhance commercial and high end residential spaces. We specialize in blending aesthetics with functionality using a wide range of materials and both innovative and creative techniques to bring each clients vision to fruition.

FULL INSTALLATION

Decotron ARTISTs provide full installation services for custom signage, lighting and architectural elements across commercial residential and public spaces. From planning through final placement our team ensures each installation is seamless, precise and crafted to make a lasting impression

Our Clients & End USERS
FACTS YOU NEED TO KNOW ABOUT Decotron

Decotron is not your ordinary art, sign, and lighting fabrication company. It is a visionary enterprise that marries the art of design with the science of innovation. With a design approach that is as unique as it is forward-thinking, the company brings together artistry, functionality, and sustainability to create products that are nothing short of extraordinary.

Our Products Are Only Limited 
by Imagination!

Explore our diverse mold offerings, ranging from Fireplace Surrounds, Columns, and Moldings to Balustrades, Ceiling Access Doors, Decorative T-Grid Tile Inlays, Corbels, Medallions, Faux Beams, and Ornaments. A Staple in the Las Vegas Hospitality Scene.

Legacy's mark is woven into the fabric of Las Vegas's hospitality and entertainment scene, gracing the interiors of numerous hotels and casinos. As visitors explore the opulent spaces, they encounter Legacy's seamless blend of artistry and functionality, contributing to the allure of the renowned entertainment capital.

We Transform Ideas into Masterpieces.

Legacy’s team has the ability to convert any concept into reality. Whether it is for a personal space, event, or a themed environment. Your imagination is our energy for creating conceptual ideas and producing mind-blowing works of art and captivating environments.

In 1952, Modern Manufacturing began as a storm door and window manufacturer. John Krizay Inc. – Custom Quartz & Alumina Fabrication

The John Krizay Company offers high quality quartz and alumina fabrication. We custom fabricate clear fused quartz cores and substrates and alumina cores for use in the investment casting and fiber optic industries. We develop specialized parts from stock sizes to meet our customer's requirements.

Our company was founded in Cleveland, Ohio in 1969 by John Krizay, Jr. The company began by servicing the aeronautics sector with quartz cores. In 1984, the company moved from Cleveland to our present location in Salem, Ohio.

John Krizay Inc. is certified to the ISO 9001:2015 standard. All of our quartz and alumina products are very high purity and superior quality, and we pride ourselves on our rapid response time to our customer's needs.

Guild Optics leads the sapphire optics industry in manufacturing high-tolerance optics for laser, military, industrial, and medical applications, leveraging a comprehensive selection of materials across UV, visible, and IR spectrums. We specialize in sapphire windows and sapphire lenses.

Precision Sapphire Optics Excellence

Guild Optical Associates, Inc. is a leader in the precision crafting of sapphire optical components. We hold ISO 9001:2015 certification and are ITAR registered. We proudly manufacture all our components in the USA, utilizing strategically sourced raw materials.

Whether it’s a single prototype or large-scale production runs, Guild Optical Associates offers tailor-made optical products, including sapphire windows, sapphire lenses, optical mirrors, fused silica optics, coated optics, optical filters, and various other specialized optical components.

Our Facility

Guild Optics’ 25,000 sq. ft. production facility allows us to manufacture precision optical sapphire windows from 1 mm up to 17 inches in diameter and spherical optical lenses as small as 10mm in diameter.

A HOME REPRESENTS WHAT MATTERS MOST TO THE PEOPLE WITHIN IT.

Taking inspiration from the home, we craft railing systems and skylight products that are easy to maintain and hard to ignore, helping us amplify the extraordinary personalities of our customers and the unique features of their homes.

SAFE & INSPIRING ENVIRONMENTS START HERE.

A home represents what matters most to the people who live within it. When a home is cultivated with care and intention, each space will welcome comfort, encourage laughter, inspire conversations, and promote ultimate relaxation.

WE DO THINGS
DIFFERENTLY,
ON PURPOSE.

With products locally made in the Pacific Northwest, we thoughtfully collaborate with customers and partners across the region and guide them through our streamlined process.

FIND YOUR NEAREST DEALER
OUR SIGNATURE PROCESS
DISCOVER OUR FAMILY OF PRODUCTS

Enjoy natural light and starry views with our sleek and stunning skylights. Handcrafted to stand the test of time, our skylight products will transform any home into a calming oasis, all while satisfying our customers’ tastes and personal aesthetics.

EXPLORE SKYLIGHTS

Our high-quality, maintenance-free railing systems extend any living space to the outdoors. From deck railings to grand staircases and beyond, each railing system is customized and follows an incredibly personalized process from start to finish.

EXPLORE RAILINGS
WHAT SETS US APART
Highly Collaborative Process

Collaboration is the fuel behind what we do at KDL. We focus on bridging the gap between our partners and customers, helping them all speak the same language. Only then can we clarify their vision and create beautiful spaces that feel like home.

Complimentary On-Site Field Measurements

We like to begin railing projects with an on-site field measurement, giving us an opportunity to assess our customers’ site, budget, aesthetic, and style. Then, we can successfully present them with options that best serve their needs.

Proudly Made in the Pacific Northwest

We’re proud to manufacture our products from Kent, WA. Being local to the Pacific Northwest helps us understand the needs of our regional customers and craft quality products for people who share our same values and lifestyle.

ABOUT US

The global leader in antimarking solutions for all sheetfed, offset presses. PrintGuard® designs and manufactures three technologies, at two price points that solve 100% of printers antimarking needs. Our Custom manufacturing equipment and proprietary chemical coatings make our Orange Hide® Glass bead technology #1 Worldwide. Our product inventions are protected under US Patents 6,811,863/7,270,873/8,381,647 and 9,868,277 and featured in both PrintGuardPlus® and Printguard Packaging® make our glass bead transfer cylinder jackets for Heidelberg presses superior to all others in the market, while our patented PrintGuard Regular® jackets offer low cost solutions for the cost sensitive printer.

LEARN MORE
OUR PRODUCTS

PrintGuard designs and manufactures industry leading anti-marking products for transfer cylinders and Impression cylinder jackets for all press types. Our patented Premium Orange and Regular Yellow jackets for Heidelberg presses are designed with patented features that deliver high ink repellency, “secure safe” press operation and  non-absorbent, water resistant properties.

PrintGuard  jackets are manufactured to support typical Commercial printing and Packaging stock up to 24 pt., mark free. Our Glass Bead Film is designed to deliver the highest performance in the industry, it is very durable and easy to clean when required. We sell this film for Komori, Mitsubishi, Akiyama, Shinohara, Sakurai and other presses.

PrintGuard’s  PerfectBlack Nano Ceramic Coated Steel Impression jackets are the finest in the world and deliver the highest quality and durability in the industry. We also have a network of mechanics world-wide to install our Ceramic jackets, offering significant project cost savings to our customers.

Metal Food Cans for America’s Favorite Brands

Silgan Containers is the leading supplier of metal containers for food packaging in North America.

OUR METAL FOOD PACKAGING COMPANY
We make Sustainable Food Packaging for Consumer Packaged Goods

As the largest provider of steel food cans and aluminum food cans and trays in the United States, Silgan Containers is trusted by America’s most respected brands. Our consumer-packaged goods manufacturing success is based on our extensive national reach and a reputation for unsurpassed technical excellence in the metal containers manufacturing process, enabling us to act as dedicated solutions-based partners to all of our customers.

LEARN MORE
WHAT WE DO
OUR METAL FOOD CAN PRODUCT LINE
Metal Food Cans 
Metal Can Ends 
Steel Chill-Cups 
New Product Development & Technology for Metal Containers

Silgan Containers has a comprehensive metal food packaging development process that incorporates consumer research to stay in tune with changing consumer preferences. This approach enables us to deliver innovative metal food packaging solutions. Our goal is not just to meet client needs but to anticipate them, creating a proactive environment focused on continuous improvement in both packaging effectiveness and sustainability.

LEARN MORE
Our Sustainable Food Packaging Journey

With a legacy spanning over a century, our expertise in sustainable food packaging and innovative food can production has shaped our journey of internal success and global impact in the metal food packaging industry. Since officially establishing our company in 1987 through the acquisition of Carnation’s Can Division, we have built a reputation rooted in trust and accountability regarding the impact of our food metal can packaging. As we look ahead, we are committed to advancing our mission of fostering a more sustainable future through innovative food packaging solutions.

LEARN MORE
SUSTAINABILITY
Why Metal Cans?

Metal food cans are 100% recyclable without loss of strength or quality. They have the highest recycling rate of any food package in addition to being efficient resource-savers since there is no need for refrigeration or freezing. Cans also help to minimize food waste compared to fresh foods, while still delivering nutrition and quality.

LEARN ABOUT SUSTAINABLE FOOD PACKAGING
WELLNESS
Why Metal Food Packaging?

Eating healthy means maximizing the nutritional benefits of your meals. Contrary to popular misconceptions, canned foods can often provide greater nutritional value than fresh alternatives.

LEARN HOW CPGS SUPPORT WELLNESS
OUR PROMISE
Food Can Partners at Every Step
CUSTOMER TECHNICAL SUPPORT

Our Technical Service Representatives offer comprehensive support for your food canning process. They specialize in the retort process, food safety, and diagnostics using our Technical Center's nine laboratories. On-site problem-solving at customer locations is also available.

LEARN MORE
CANNING EQUIPMENT SERVICES

Our expert CPG Manufacturing technicians have the experience and know-how to ensure your process is always running from routine visits to mission-critical troubleshooting. We are experts in can manufacturing equipment and processes and keeping plant production optimized.

LEARN MORE
SILGAN UNIVERSITY: METAL FOOD PACKAGING TRAINING

We offer technical and equipment training courses led by experienced professionals in metal food packaging to strengthen our customer partnerships.

READ MORE

We reward excellence and visionary thinking across all departments and levels. Our culture encourages employees to share new ideas, push their limits, and achieve their career goals. Join us and become part of a team central to everyday life, with roles ranging from product innovation to meeting fundamental consumer needs. Our industry offers job stability, driven by consistent demand regardless of economic trends.

The Mosser Story

Family owned and operated Mosser Glass is proud to have been creating a variety of American-made products for generations. Read more about our family’s legacy blending beauty and fine craftsmanship in every piece of glassware we produce.

What We Do


New Products
Mosser offers high quality glass in classic and contemporary designs. Several categories of patterns are available including tableware, cake plates, candle stands and home décor.


Custom Moulds
Our extensive portfolio of custom glass moulds allows us to create a variety of complex shapes and unique forms to fit any theme or design throughout all Mosser glassware products.


Retail Store & Factory Tours
Mosser Glass offers area tourists a guided tour through our facility, where you will see our talented craftsman at work and learn about the process of glass making.

Celebrity Showcase
Mosser glass products have been featured on a variety of media. From SciFi Channel’s How It’s Made to music videos and guest placement on talk shows, Mosser Glass is recognized as one of the nation’s leaders in high quality pressed glass.
Collector Community

Dealer Locator
Mosser Glass has distributors across the nation. Find our friendly associates near you.


What We Make

We have been manufacturing quality hand-pressed glass products for over forty years. Our handcrafted glassware is lead free. Our lines consist of Carnival and Opalescent, as well as hand-decorated pieces.

OVER 50 YEARS OF LEADING CHANGE IN CONTAINER LEASING, SEACO HAS A REPUTATION FOR KNOWLEDGE, MANUFACTURING QUALITY AND INNOVATION.

We aim to be a “value add” long term partner to our customers. Our diversified high specification fleet allows us to supply all of our customers equipment needs. With decades of experience in the industry, our highly experienced employees seek to understand and meet our customers’ needs. We believe in being straightforward and transparent with our business partners and we are actively involved in CSR projects across the globe.

OUR SERVICES
WITH GLOBAL KNOWLEDGE AND LOCAL EXPERTISE, OUR TEAM OFFERS ADVICE ON ALL ASPECTS OF CONTAINERIZATION INCLUDING LEASING, SALES, ONE-WAY MOVE, AND CONTAINER FLEET MANAGEMENT.
CONTAINER LEASING

Seaco began leasing containers in the 1960’s and is now one of the world’s leading container lessors. Our flexible leasing options include Operating Lease and Finance lease suitable for short- and long-term durations including sale and leaseback.

CONTAINER LEASING
CONTAINER SALES

Seaco regularly sells from our large and diverse fleet. Suitable for portable storage, transportation, or modification projects. Containers are available from a global network of depot locations.

CONTAINER SALES
ONE-WAY MOVE

One-Way Move, provides customers the option to lease a container which can be picked up at one location and returned to another location, subject to Seaco’s terms and conditions.

ONE-WAY MOVE
“WITH A DIVERSIFIED HIGH SPEC FLEET AND A GLOBAL PRESENCE FOR A GLOBAL INDUSTRY - WE ARE SEACO.”
- JEREMY MATTHEW, CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER
THE SEACO DIFFERENCE
FLEXIBILITY & CUSTOMIZATION

Seaco offers flexible short to long-term container leasing options, helping customers to maximize the benefits of utilizing Seaco and their own fleets. Our new containers are manufactured to high specification and custom design solutions are available to suit specific and technical requirements.

CUSTOMER SERVICE OPERATIONS

Our people are the backbone of Seaco.  We are proud to have an international and dedicated team of qualified and experienced industry representatives, who are committed in ensuring our global operating structures are efficiently equipped to support the global and local needs of our customers.

GLOBAL REACH

Seaco has established office representation in Americas, EMEIA, Asia and Oceania. Regionally and globally, we are able to support international trade from our diverse fleet of equipment.

UNMATCHED INDUSTRY EXPERIENCE

Seaco has a proud history spanning over 50 years. In the pioneer years of containerization, we were directly involved in the manufacturing of containers.  Collaborating with leading manufacturers, Seaco has been responsible for product innovation and influencing many major advances in the technical design and construction of shipping container equipment.  Seaco’s shared technical knowledge bank enables our team to confidently advise and support customers on the right container types and fleet strategies.

QUALITY & SAFETY

Through continuous investment in research and development, Seaco’s fleet of containers are built to high specification, to help reduce operating, maintenance, and repair costs. All our containers are inspected to ensure they are compliant with international regulations, industry certifications and approvals.

INNOVATIVE SOLUTIONS

Seaco has a history of product innovation
and providing flexible leasing solutions for our customers.   We are a member of the UN Global Compact Network – UK, but across the world, Seaco is also committed to comply to the principles of human rights, labor, environment, and anti-corruption.  We are on a transformational journey, adopting best practices and influencing the global supply-chain on container leasing.

EQUIPMENT
DRY FREIGHT CONTAINERS

Our intermodal fleet of Standard and High Cube dry freight containers are designed for the watertight and secure transportation of non-perishable dry cargo such as electronics, furniture, apparel, and dry foods.

REFRIGERATED CONTAINERS

A leading reefer container lessor with a fleet of >200k units worldwide. Standard and High Cube units equipped with the latest high performance, temperature controlled, energy efficient refrigerated machinery.

DRY FREIGHT SPECIALS

We offer a diverse fleet of intermodal dry freight specials designed for the safe and secure transportation of heavy breakbulk cargo such as yachts, railcars, lumber, reels & rolls, construction equipment, mining machinery and materials.

TANK CONTAINERS

Seaco is one of the world’s leading tank lessors with a modern and diversified fleet of standard and specialized tanks ranging from T11 to T75 and capacities from 12,000 – 46,000 litres.

SERVICES
CONTAINER LEASING

Seaco began leasing containers in the 1960’s and is now one of the world’s leading container lessors. Our flexible leasing options include Operating Lease and Finance lease suitable for short- and long-term durations including sale and leaseback.

CONTAINER SALES

Seaco regularly sells a wide variety from a large and diverse fleet. Available from a global network of depot locations, we can offer equipment to our customers when and where it is needed.

ONE-WAY MOVE

One-Way Move, provides customers the option to lease a container which can be picked up at one location and returned to another location, subject to Seaco’s terms and conditions.

CONTAINER FLEET MANAGEMENT

Seaco has the expertise and infrastructure to manage third party container fleets under an asset management agreement.

INDUSTRY SOLUTIONS
SHIPPING & LOGISTICS

Over 50 years being a trusted partner to this sector, offering flexible leasing of equipment, and supporting asset management strategies worldwide.

RETAIL & MANUFACTURING

Our modern and diverse fleet of container equipment is suitable for the intermodal shipment of almost every cargo type, weight, and size.

AGRICULTURE & FOOD

Seaco’s equipment portfolio is suitable for the transportation and portable storage of food grade, hazardous, bulk liquids and powders, and the movement of out-of-gauge machinery and equipment.

ENERGY & NATURAL RESOURCES

We have a diverse tank and dry freight specials fleet, suitable for the intermodal shipment of petrochemicals, gases, and for the carriage of raw minerals.

CONSTRUCTION & ENGINEERING

In addition to our standard range of boxes, reefers and tanks, Seaco has a range of dry freight specials, including palletwides, flatracks, rolltrailers and open tops for the transportation of out-of-gauge bulky cargo.

ABOUT US
WELCOME TO SEACO

Seaco’s 50-year legacy is built on knowledge, quality, and innovation. We’re your valued partner with a diverse fleet, transparent practices, and global impact.

SENIOR LEADERSHIP

Seaco is led by strong Executive Leadership and supported by a global senior management team with years of industry knowledge and expertise.

CORPORATE SOCIAL RESPONSIBILITY

Seaco has an enduring commitment to serving the needs of people in communities worldwide and to fulfilling our public responsibilities.

Welcome to Best Glass Designs (BGD)
Elevate Your Space with Our Glass Creations

Hello and welcome! At Best Glass Designs, we’re passionate about transforming spaces with our exquisite glass partitions, doors, and walls. Whether you’re looking to add a touch of elegance to your home or create a stunning, professional environment in your office, we have the perfect glass solutions for you.

About Us

Since 1977, we’ve been crafting high-quality beveled glass panels, starting from a small manufacturer for restaurants and hotels, to now serving customers nationwide. Our journey has been fueled by our dedication to quality and innovation, and we’re proud to bring our expertise to you.

Our Offerings
Glass Partitions

Our glass partitions are designed to create beautiful, open spaces while maintaining privacy. They’re perfect for both residential and commercial settings, providing a modern and sophisticated look.

Glass Doors

Make a grand entrance with our custom glass doors. Crafted from premium materials, our doors are not only functional but also serve as a statement piece, adding style and elegance to any entryway.

Glass Walls

Our glass walls are perfect for dividing spaces without compromising on natural light. They create a seamless and airy feel, making them ideal for offices, homes, and commercial spaces.

Why Choose Us?
Experience and Expertise: With over four decades of experience, we know how to deliver quality and craftsmanship.
Nationwide Network: Our products are available through a wide network of dealers across the country, ensuring easy access and installation.
Innovative Solutions: From triple-glazing to prefinished entry systems, we’re always at the forefront of glass design innovation.
Customer-Centric: We’re dedicated to creating products that not only meet but exceed your expectations.
Explore Our Collection

Discover how our glass partitions, doors, and walls can transform your space. Whether you’re looking for sleek, modern designs for your office or elegant, timeless pieces for your home, Best Glass Designs has you covered. Additionally, our partner offers similar products, which you can explore at https://crystaliaglass.com/glass-partitions/glass-partition-wall-systems-for-office/.

Our services

Electronic Assembly & Design

MFI has extensive experience designing and assembling electronic medical devices. From small diameter CMOS endoscopes with 0201 LED’s to Advanced image processing systems. Custom GUI's and algorithms can be designed per request.

CNC Machining

With MFI's state of the art machine shop get quick turnaround quotes on CNC machining, which includes turning, milling, laser etching, and 3D printing on various metals and plastics. MFI machines optical coupler, eyepieces, adapters, and much more.

Micro Optics Design & Assembly

Micro optics assembly has been a specialty of Myriad’s for over 20 years. MFI’s catalogue of lenses range from .25mm to over 10mm in diameter. Myriad is able to offer the worlds smallest borescope with a .37mm diameter.

CMOS Imaging

Micro Soldering co-ax cables to .65mm image sensors, custom PCB’s for easy SMD assembly. Choose myriad as your CMOS imaging partner and help change the standard of healthcare!

Image Processing

MFI understands image processing is essential to maintain a superior image when selecting the proper CMOS camera for your design. Patient isolation should always be considered.

Fujikura Image Fiber

MFI is a U.S. distributor of small diameter fused silica based coherent image fiber and illumination fibers. With a large inventory stocked in house same day deliveries are a daily routine.

Welcome to the

Center for Natural Medicine

The Center for Natural Medicine in Eagle River is a general naturopathic medicine practice that focuses on the wellness of you and your family. Our providers are clinically trained in the use of a wide variety of natural therapeutic techniques. We combine and tailor treatments to the needs of each individual based on a philosophy that acknowledges the patient as an active participant.

Our focus is on people, not disease. The goal is to restore your health using safe and effective therapies such as acupuncture, clinical nutrition, exercise, herbal medicine, homeopathy, hydrotherapy, lifestyle counseling, physical medicine, primary care and more.

Our natural health center serves the communities of Anchorage, Eagle River, and the Mat-Su valley.

Natural Medicine

Located in Eagle River, Alaska, Dr. Dan Young ND, LAc and his team of caring professionals at The Center for Natural Medicine are here to help you enjoy a long and healthy life utilizing naturopathic and acupuncture modalities.

The body can be very self-healing and we believe in helping you achieve as much of your own body’s ability to get you through medically challenging times.

Naturopathic/Oriental Medicine & Herbology

As a Naturopathic Doctor (ND), Dr. Young is trained in all aspects of medicine, with the skills to treat and help with a comprehensive list of health conditions affecting people of all ages.

Whether you are a lifelong fan of functional medicine or are new to the idea, we are here to help identify the underlying causes that are preventing healing from occurring. We then offer a natural, scientific course of treatment personalized to your specific needs.

Acupuncture

Dr. Young is a licensed LAc and blends his naturopathic experience with acupuncture every day. Acupuncture is a technique for balancing the flow of energy or life force — known as qi or chi (CHEE) flows through pathways (meridians) in your body.

Acupuncture helps to stimulate nerves, muscles and connective tissue. This stimulation helps boosts your body’s natural painkillers and increases blood flow.

Center For Natural Medicine In the Media

The story of how Dr. Dan Young first met Dr. Tei Fu Chen is a story of inspiration and an encounter that changed lives, not only Dan's but his family and friends who he has introduced to Sunrider. Learn about Dan's favorite Sunrider foods and how the products help him in Martial Arts. A story of West Meets East. Share this video with your customers please.

Precision molded glass lenses for applications in the visible and near-infrared (NIR) wavebands, such as laser diode collimation, focusing, and fiber coupling.

Lens Assemblies

By leveraging our broad optical component portfolio, LightPath has been implementing sophisticated integrated optical assemblies.

Precision Glass Molding

Molding is the most consistent and economical way to produce high-volume aspheres, and LightPath has perfected this method to offer the most precise aspheric lenses available.

Infrared Imaging Cores
Custom Optical Design

Our in-house engineering and manufacturing teams collaborate closely with you to create lenses that meet your unique requirements.

Diamond-Turning

With over 20 in-house single point diamond turning machines, we produce rotationally symmetric spheres, aspheres, and diffractive lenses, including those with diameters as small as 3mm.

Coatings

LightPath offers a range of optical coatings to enhance your systems’ performance and meet your optical needs.

Optical Fabrication

LightPath offers both standard and custom-made lenses, expertly designed by our optical engineers or manufactured to your specifications

Materials

There are over 200 moldable glass types available, but LightPath focuses on a select few to ensure the fastest lead times and lowest costs for our customers.

Blow Glass Anytime, Anywhere!
The Big Dragon, Little Dragon, Baby Dragon, Mini Dragon, and Phoenix Glass Furnaces are affordable, fuel efficient, safe, easy to use and incredibly versatile. No longer will you be burning cash while you sleep! Turn it on when you want to blow glass, shut it off when you are finished. Take the glass studio to the people. The perfect solution for the weekend warrior, hobbyist, and professional alike. Great as a promotional tool for large scale existing studios - get the word out with live demos. Schedule workshops at Art Centers, Summer Camps, Back Yard Parties, and anywhere else you can think of. Hit the road and bring your glass studio with you!

Furnace, Glory Hole & Pipe Warmer all in a single unit, designed to be portable & easy to move around your shop, or the country. Accessory Ports allow for additional equipment to be attached & operate from the furnace heat, including annealing options, hot box/garage for pick ups, cane warmer, hot plate, baking oven, or anything else you can dream up!

There are now over 300 of our glass blowing furnaces in operation around the country & world. Our owners range from absolute beginners to accomplished professionals. Dragon and Phoenix furnaces can be found in public access studios, private studios, high schools, colleges, art centers, summer camps, garages & backyards. They are being used in youth out-reach programs, on-site demonstrations, as back-up furnaces (additional to a standing studio or for when the big ones break down), for hands-on & walk in workshops, as well as production and prototyping.

WELCOME SERVICE REQUEST


CUSTOM SIGNAGE & LIGHTING FABRICATORS

City Sign is a full service signage and lighting fabricator drawing on over nine decades of industry experience. Our number one goal is to exceed expectations, bringing unique visions to life on time and within budget. This commitment to quality and consistency has led to many long-standing relationships with our clients.   

As a family owned and operated company, we at City Sign believe every client should be given the same utmost respect and commitment we would ask of ourselves. We take pride in making sure each and every project is completed to 100% satisfaction. When you hire us to handle your signage needs you get more than just a vendor, you get a partner.

 

 

  




From Concept to Installation and Beyond

 

Our team of designers work closely with you and your account representative to help visualize your unique ideas. We can design conceptual renderings, or take your already developed ideas and turn them into working production drawings.

We are committed to ensuring your image is interpreted correctly and that your brand is successfully reinforced.

 

 

Each client and their project is handled by one of our trusted account representatives. He or she will work with you on every project aspect such as, value engineering, permit procurement, and time management.

You can be assured that your project manager will handle all the behind-the-scenes details to keep your project running smoothly and worry free.  

 

Our in house 22,000 square foot manufacturing facility incorporates current technology and equipment along with highly skilled and experienced union fabricators, electricians, and painters.

Our fabricators always enjoy a challenge and have yet to come across a sign that could not be built. If you can imagine it, we can build it! 

 

Our experienced team of installers can handle most any job. We support a full line of installation and service trucks, with up to 125' manned bucket and crane capabilities. Our expertise does not stop at installation, as we offer complete signage and lighting servicing.

From neon and bulb replacement to LED lighting conversions and on-site signage repair, we have you covered for the life of your sign.




A Tradition of Quality & Excellence

OVER 90 YEARS OF EXPERIENCE

Since its founding by Maurice E. Entliss in 1922, City Sign Service, Inc. has been providing signage and lighting solutions for the Delaware Valley and beyond. Originally located  in a three story brick building at 1306 Callowhill Street in Philadelphia, Entliss grew the company behind his skills as a designer, draftsman and artist. In 1989 Entliss decided to retire from the signage business and he sold City Sign to its current ownership, the Carson family.

The Carsons moved the company to Ambler, and then eventually to its current location in Horsham, Montgomery County, in 1994.

Learn How Calumite Slag
Helps Your Business
Environmental Benefits
Economic Advantages
Quality Improvements
Economically Smart.
Environmentally Sound.

An essential raw material for the glass industry, Calumite Slag is an environmentally beneficial alumina source used in all types of soda-lime-silica glass production. Its unique melting and refining properties enable producers to reduce energy consumption and reduce CO2 and NOx emissions while improving product quality

For those in the glass-making industry, the integration of Calumite Slag as the essential raw material offers a clear opportunity that is beneficial to the environment, product quality, and the economic health of your operations.

Calumite Slag ’s innovative, slag-based composition makes it the glass makers’ raw material of choice in the production of soda-lime-silica glass. Calumite Slag ’s improved melting efficiency gives you reduced CO2 emissions, reduced NOx emissions, and reduced energy consumption, among other advantages. This translates into energy savings, increased glass yield, and improved glass quality.

Calumite Slag . It’s Economically Smart, Environmentally Sound, and the preferred, green raw material for glass manufacturers worldwide.

Quality Is Our Standard

 

Since 1955, Spectrocell has manufactured equipment and components for use in the analytical sciences and research industry. Spectrocell has been a pioneer and leader in the fabrication of spectrophotometer cells for UV-VIS, NIR and other applications. Our products are manufactured exclusively in our plant located in suburban Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, USA. We employ opticians, scientific glass blowers, tool and die specialists, mechanical engineers, and other specially trained technicians specific to our operations.

While we maintain an independent quality assurance department, every individual involved in manufacturing at Spectrocell is trained for quality performance. Statistical process control over many years has resulted in highly precision products and extremely low rejection rates. Finally, we are committed to a process of continuous improvement of our operations, including timely and responsive service.

All of us at Spectrocell are very aware of the importance of your spectrophotometer tests. Our extensive experience and dedication to quality and service ensures you, the user, of the best possible results. We also take pride in the service we provide to our customers; your ultimate satisfaction with us is what keeps us in business. Over 60 years of continuous production is, we believe, a testament to our dedication and expertise.

Spectrocell is the only US-based company still making standard spectrophotometer cells. We have a quick turnaround time on all stocked items, many shipping same or next day. All of our products are fully fire-fused, so you never have to worry about parts disassembling in expensive spectrophotometer machines. Remember that when you deal with Spectrocell you are dealing with the actual manufacturer, not a sales rep or a middleman; this can save you both time and money. Check out our new website and if you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact us.

At Glas Werk Inc, we leverage cutting-edge technology and skilled craftsmanship to deliver high-quality glass products tailored to our clients’ specific needs.
Learn More

Glas Werk, Inc. manufactures Custom Quartzware, Quartz Glass & Scientific Glassblowing Materials For The Semiconductor Industry. Products Include Furnace Tubes, Horizontal/Vertical Wafer Boats (2-12″), Process Tubes & Chambers, Pedestals, Transparent & Opaque Bell Jars, Large Quartz Coils, Injection & T/C Sheets, & Solid Machining In Ceramics & Quartz. Servicing Industrial & Manufacturing Sectors Including R&D, Air Pollution Control Testing, Medical Glass Instruments, & Laboratory Glassware. Custom Quartz Parts For Applications Including Semiconductor, Optical Communication & Lighting Industries. Machinery Processes CNC Mill, Vertical Annealing Apparatus, Large Kiln & Automated Flame Polishing. Design & Engineering Assistance Available.

Glas Werk Inc. offers customers quality custom quartz parts for application in the semiconductor, optical communication and lighting industries, just to name a few.  We have developed truly innovative solutions for the unique challenges present in each of these industries and possess a thorough understanding of the real world needs and expectations our customers demand. This understanding is a constant motivating force driving Glas Werk to produce products that exceed customer expectations.

We were obtaining bids for roof replacement and immediately noticed that all of the companies recommended Tam Skylights. We are so glad that we reached out to them, and cannot say enough good things about our experience! We worked directly with Jason. He skillfully helped us to discover what we wanted and needed for our home. He also worked very closely with our roofing company to ensure the installation was perfect. We love our Skylights and the service we received. Our family room is so much more comfortable with the frosted glass to block the heat but not the light and a manually opening skylight to improve ventilation. I highly recommend Tam Skylights to anyone looking to update or add Skylights to their home or business!

BRIAN AND MAGGIE, SOUTH SEATTLE

We have replaced many failed units from other manufacturers over the years with Tam Skylights. I always tell my customers with confidence that properly installed Tam Skylights do not leak.

JOHN BERGIN, PRESIDENT OF BERGIN ROOFING INC.

I had a very large 6 X 12 deck skylight made by Tam in West Seattle. There are 5 wood structural house beams under the 5 panel skylight that needed to be perfectly in-line with the skylight panel framing in order to have a nice visual look from the deck looking up. Jason (super good guy) came out 3-4 times to talk, bid, measure and double measure to make sure it was perfect. It was perfect in the beams alignment to the 5 panel framing. Excellent quality, service and pricing. We couldn't have been more pleased from start to finish!

SCOTT, SOUTH SEATTLE

It has been a privilege for us to partner with TAM Skylights. We have worked side by side on numerous projects large and small creating lasting memories for our clients. TAM Skylights will go above and beyond for you and your company. I am happy to recommend TAM skylights for all you day lighting needs.

JOE, KENT

Have you ever had a TAM skylight fail? I’ve been roofing right here in Seattle since 1989. I’ve been roofing right here in Seattle since 1989 and used both Crystalite and TAM (mostly the latter in the last 2 decades) literally hundreds of times per brand. Never once has a TAM skylight failed that I’ve ever seen, whether on one of my installations or others. I find it remarkable that these 2 brands, for all intents and purposes (that I can see) are identical, yet I have confidence in only one of them. TAM is the best, most dependable skylight available in the Northwest. I rely on and recommend TAM Skylights

BLAKE, LYNNWOOD

Fastemp Glass is a privately held company founded in 1981 in Northern Kentucky, just across the Ohio River from Cincinnati.

We stock more than 30 different types and sizes of glass, from clear to colored and patterned. We have the capability to provide tempered glass from 1/8″ to 3/4″ thick.

At Fastemp, we combine knowledge, technology and experience to produce a quality product at competitive prices. Our best attribute, however, is a commitment to customer satisfaction. It is the principle on which the company was founded and something we strive to uphold every day.

INALFA ROOF SYSTEMS

We are an engineering-driven company, specialized in the design, development, and manufacturing of innovative solutions on a global scale, meeting the highest quality standards. At Inalfa, our top priority is ensuring a positive customer and end-user experience.

Our roof systems are designed to give people around the world an exceptional driving and in-vehicle experience. They are renowned for their modular approach, space-efficient installation, and low-noise design. With operations in 16 locations around the world, we serve more than 40 vehicle brands worldwide.

PRODUCT AND SOLUTIONS

Inalfa Roof Systems provides innovative and comprehensive roof systems to the global automotive industry, specializing in system integration for roof applications, with value-add functionalities in sunblinds, glass, and sensors.

Aladdin's Glass & Screen Services in Lexington, KY
PATIO ROOMS

Aladdin's patio rooms are all custom built by our full time employees. Because no job is the same, we use several suppliers using the best products to fit the special needs of your job. From million dollar homes to houseboats & ice cream carts, Aladdin's can build a glass or screen room for any application.

More Info
SHOWER DOORS & ENCLOSURES

Aladdin's Glass specializes in custom glass shower enclosures. We sell and install glass enclosures to fit almost any tub or shower application. All of our installations are done “in house” by trained and experienced Aladdin's Glass employees. We offer framed, semi-frameless, and frameless options for both sliding and swing door applications.

More Info
COMMERCIAL GLASS
& STOREFRONTS

Aladdin's Glass offers a full range of commercial glazing services. We offer free estimates on any remodel, new construction, or commercial fit-up project you may have. We also warranty all of the products we install for 1 year, in addition to our manufacturer's warranty. No job is too big or too small, so give us a call on your next commercial project.

 

More Info
CUSTOM CUT GLASS
& MIRRORS

Aladdin's Glass stocks a wide variety of glass types and thicknesses. If we don't have the particular glass you need in stock, we can usually have it ordered and cut for you in a timely fashion. We provide and sell glass for many types of applications.

More Info
ABOUT US

Based in the Lexington KY area, Aladdin's Glass is a full service glass & screen company that was formed in 1989. We offer a full range of glass & screen products for the residential and commercial industries. These products include, but are not limited to, mirrors, shower doors, patio rooms, patio covers, carports, commercial storefront, and custom cut glass & screens. We pride ourselves on being courteous, knowledgeable, and professional with the homeowners, contractors, architects, and designers we work with. We warranty and service all the products we install and never subcontract our work out to others.

We are located 5 minutes south of Lexington in Nicholasville, Ky. We primarily do most of our work in Central Kentucky, but also travel statewide on larger projects. We are members of the Home Builders Association and the Better Business Bureau. Locally owned and operated, let Aladdin's Glass show you why we should be your first choice for your next project.

A HISTORY OF QUALITY

Since 1974 Glass Fab Inc. has met customers stringent specifications by providing fabricated parts made of optical glass, filter glass, fused quartz and fused silica, low expansion materials, and various other optical materials. Because of this, Glass Fab has grown to become a world leader in fabricating quality optical blanks.

OUR SERVICES
Optical Materials

With over 100,000 lbs of raw inventory, our skilled craftsmen can fabricate most parts rapidly and consistently.

Glass Machining

With our full range of capability and our large capacity, we can make blanks in high volume consistently and quickly.

Quality & Testing

Glass Fab Inc. is committed to provide defect-free products and services to our worldwide customer base.

WHAT WE DO

We purchase optical materials such as optical glass, filter glass, fused quartz and silica, and low expansion materials in bulk form and convert them into near net-shaped blanks to our customers specifications. Our full range of machining capabilities, our overall machine capacity, and our cost effective purchasing allows us to provide competitive pricing and lead times.

OUR COMMITTMENT

Glass Fab Inc. is 100% committed to quality and our customer's satisfaction. Our pride and confidence in our employees provides the means to meet, and through continuous improvement, exceed our customer's expectations.

MADE IN THE USA

		
Sight Glass Windows, Lights & Level Gauges
A pioneer in the safety sight glass industry, PresSure Products Company (PPC) produces a complete line of sight glasses, liquid level gauges, sight flow indicators, process lights, reactors/chambers and concentration monitoring systems.


Watch our Tech Talks and PPC process unit assembly how-to videos.
		
普莱斯 公司的中文网站和产品订购信息请点击这里
		
Be sure to check out what's new
here at PresSure Products Company!

				



	
The PPC Edge: Our glass sealing technology offers unrivaled temperature and pressure ratings, along with ease of maintenance that translates to increased safety.
The highest stress imposed on any sight glass window is at the edge of the sealing gasket. This stress is needed to cause the gasket to undergo plastic deformation to conform to its mating surfaces. This sealing stress is far in excess of any process pressure that the unit may experience. As this sealing stress is always imposed on the gasket and the glass, it causes the gasket to continue deforming and the glass to continue weakening; eventually, excessive deformation of the gasket will cause the gasket to become too thin, resulting in a leak. Simply compressing an already too-thin gasket will often result in damage to the unit. The unique design of PPC's sight glass units eliminates such dangers and guarantees high operational safety and sealing performance under the most extreme temperature and pressure conditions.


The PPC Edge: Our sight glass windows are sealed along the side walls of the glass, not on the surfaces.
When the packing materials that seal our sight glass units are compressed to create the necessary plastic deformation, the sealing compression is applied to the packing material, which surrounds the side wall of the sight window. Without a direct compression path to the glass, the possibility of excessive compression of the sealing material imposing damaging stresses on the glass is greatly reduced. Process pressure, which is applied on the surfaces of the window, is decoupled from the sealing pressure, which is applied on the side walls. This decoupling enables softer, higher-temperature glassy materials such as fused quartz to be used in higher-pressure applications. And if a leak develops, further compression of the sealing material can be achieved with far less danger of damaging the glass window, and without always having to replace the sealing material, which would require taking the unit out of service. Higher pressure and temperature ratings, along with ease of maintaining seals in the real world, are the traits of PPC's sight windows.

WE WELCOME THE OPPORTUNITY TO SERVICE YOUR SHOWER DOOR AND ENCLOSURE NEEDS

SOUTH BAY SHOWERS INC.

For over Forty years, South Bay Showers has been the Bay Area’s preferred company for custom manufacturing and installation. Specializing in semi-framed and custom Frameless heavy glass enclosures, South Bay Showers is know for unsurpassed quality and professional installation. Our friendly and experienced staff is ready to help your design ideas become a reality. South Bay Showers offers the finest quality shower enclosures, cultured marble products, mirrors and mirror wardrobe doors, cabinet glass and shelves, vanity and medicine cabinets, shower pans and windows. Because South Bay Showers is a manufacturer and distributor, we are able to offer the highest levels of quality at affordable prices. There are dozens of available finishes to endless amounts of options relating to hinges, handles, towel bars and accessories. From clear to patterned obscures, glass options are also numerous and diverse.

SERVICES

MEASURING

Measure twice, cut once. That's the motto the professionals live by. Measuring for a shower enclosure is one of the most crucial steps in the process. Errors as small as 1/16th of an inch can bring things to a halt come installation day. Sure, we all know how to use a tape measure, but there's much more to it. Bringing one of our professionals on site will help ensure things go smoothly. Experience is paramount. When we step foot into the space our professional's trained eyes are peeled for all sort of oddities you may not see or even know to look for. Trust us.

DELIVERY

As you might be aware, a shower enclosure isn't just something you can have UPS or FedEx pick up and deliver. Often the components exceed the limitations and restrictions of normal shipping companies. Our local delivery services are for you. When it comes to delivery outside our immediate area, we've developed relationships with freight companies that specialize in the delivery of fragile materials throughout the world. As you can imagine, through over half a decade of experience we've developed custom packing, delivery solutions and methodologies that will make sure your products arrive on site in perfect condition, ready to install - on time.

INSTALLATION

It's not rocket science, but it does take a great deal of knowledge, experience, and skill. Up for a challenge? Maybe the DIY solution is for you. Check our our Resource Center. Prefer to rest assured everything is done correctly? We're here to serve you.

Our experienced professionals have installed over 100,000 enclosures in thousands of different environments over the years. We do it right from start to finish. Not only will we handle the installation, but we also offer demolition and removal services for upgrades and renovations. Sit back and relax knowing not only our work, but your satisfaction is 100% guaranteed!

CUTTING, FABRICATION & TEMPERING

Here at South Bay Showers Inc, we have the latest machines in glass cutting, fabrication, and even tempering. Our specialized team works meticulously to create your custom glass cuts from start to finish. Each piece of glass is manufactured right here in the Bay Area, within our beautiful Santa Clara warehouse location.

WE'D LIKE TO CLEAR SOMETHING UP

SEACLEAR is an innovative glass design and manufacturing company. For over 30 years we have been producing our products for an international customer base.  


Founder Scott Sperbeck was captain of a crab vessel in the Bering Sea during a severe Winter storm in 1987. Fighting to see out the iced-up pilothouse windows, an idea came to mind. He used his mechanical and electronics background to design and patent electrically-heated film that would prevent windows from icing up or fogging at sea. The result was the birth of SEACLEAR in 1991. His first-hand experience and understanding of the effects of extreme conditions on marine equipment led to the development of world-class products still made in the USA today.

SEACLEAR is committed to our customers by focusing on a quality product, on-time delivery, and personal service.

Precision Glassblowing
Custom Scientific Glassware Since 1982

Precision Glassblowing has been manufacturing ICP/ICP-MS, laboratory, and custom scientific glassware for more than 40 years. Founded in 1982 by master glassblower Ken Petrie, Precision has grown to a staff of more than 40 glassblowers with a combined professional glassblowing experience exceeding 400 years.

From Atom Traps to Laser Spectroscopy Precision Glassblowing Supports It All

Precision Glassblowing of Colorado is your one-stop shop for all your scientific glassware needs. Whether you need custom-made glass products, standard glass products, or glass repair services, we have you covered.

 

We specialize in creating high-quality glassware for analytical chemistry applications, such as ICP, ICP-MS, AAS, and more. We use only the best quartz and borosilicate materials and follow strict quality standards to ensure the optimal performance and durability of our glass products. We can design and fabricate any glass product that you need, from simple laboratory glassware to more complex components such as torches, nebulizers, and spray chambers. From one piece to thousands.

 

We also offer a wide range of standard glass products that are compatible with various instruments and manufacturers. We have an extensive inventory of glass products that are ready to ship to you at competitive prices. You can browse our catalog and order online or contact our sales representatives for more information.

Precision Glassblowing Does Repair and Restoration

In addition to our glass products, Precision Glassblowing also offers glass repair services that can save you money and time. We can repair and restore your broken or cracked glassware to its original condition. We have the expertise and equipment to handle any glass repair, from superficial cracks to complex rebuilds. We also offer a fast turnaround time and a satisfaction guarantee.

Your Custom Glassware Partner Across Industries and Endeavors

Precision Glassblowing is not only a glassware supplier, but also a partner for your scientific endeavors. We support various labs and industries that use our glassware for research and innovation, including universities and their quantum physics labs. We also serve other industries such as environmental, pharmaceutical, biotechnology, metallurgy, and more. We are always ready to assist you with your glassware needs and challenges.

 

Contact us today and discover how Precision Glassblowing of Colorado can help you with your scientific glassware needs.

About Precision Glassblowing

A Leader in Custom Scientific Glassware. When it comes to manufacturing and supplying high-quality glassware for various scientific applications, it’s all about Precision Glassblowing. That is because this company is leading the way in glass technologies for ICP, laboratory, optical, cannabis, and more for over 40 years.
Founded in 1982 by master glassblower Ken Petrie, the company has grown to a staff of 40+ glassblowers with a combined professional glassblowing experience exceeding 400 years. The company is based in Centennial, Colorado, and serves customers worldwide...

Machining Services

Machining services are critical when working with scientific glassware and parts. That is because scientific glassblowing is a specialized field that requires high precision, skill, and creativity. It involves the use of various techniques and tools to shape, join, and modify glass materials for scientific and industrial applications. Precision Glassblowing offers, for example, laser cutting, etching, and drilling as well as CNC machining and ultrasonic milling. We have more than 30 + lathes (small F to 11″ bore). Precision Glassblowing also offers diamond cutting, sandblasting, centerless grinding, semi-automated coiling, optical polishing, vacuum sealing and silvering, and gas filling.

Machining Services
